title: Intensive Workshop on Information Literacy and Research Skills for Mathematics Researchers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Composed of offline activities simulating asynchronous virtual learning environments for practicing professionals.

learning_goals: Learners search for credible research materials in mathematics using at least three search strategies in academic databases.
Learners practice applying at least three appropriate citation methods to prevent plagiarism when writing research papers.
Learners analyze the credibility of academic sources according to a 5-level evaluation criterion using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
